import React , { useState , useCallback , useMemo }from 'react' import { Button, Form , Input } from 'antd' import Link from 'next/dist/client/link' import styled from 'styled-components' import useInput from '../hooks/useInput' const ButtonWrapper = styled.div` ` const FormWrapper = styled(Form)` padding : 10px; ` const LoginForm = ({ setIsLoggedIn }) => { const [id , onChangeId] = useInput('') const [password , onChangePassword] = useInput('') const style = useMemo(() => ({ marginTop : "10px"}), []) const onSubmitForm = useCallback(() => { console.log(id, password) setIsLoggedIn(true) }, [id , password]) return (

) } export default LoginForm
